channel.title: Release on JobRunr
channel.description: Recent content in Release on JobRunr

item.title: v2.0.0 - Kotlin support!
item.description: Release v2.0.0 - now ready for Kotlin

item.title: v1.3.0 - Small improvements
item.description: Release v1.3.0 - aka Made in Germany

item.title: v1.2.0 - Amazon DocumentDB
item.description: Again support for a new datastore - this time for Amazon DocumentDB!

item.title: v1.1.0 - Notifications
item.description: New improvements for Spring and notifications for jobs that don’t exist anymore

item.title: Finally, v1.0.0
item.description: We’re there, JobRunr v1.0.0 is released!

item.title: v0.9.16 & 0.9.17 - ElasticSearch support
item.description: ElasticSearch support, Redis and MongoDB improvements and almost at 1.0

item.title: v0.9.16 & 0.9.17 - ElasticSearch support
item.description: Redis and MongoDB improvements, ElasticSearch support and almost at 1.0

item.title: v0.9.12 & 0.9.13 - DB2 and GraalVM native
item.description: Run your background jobs at warp speed thanks to GraalVM native mode.

item.title: v0.9.10 & v0.9.11 - Quarkus & MicroProfile support
item.description: JobRunr now supports MicroProfile and Quarkus using Json-B

item.title: v0.9.9 - Usability and performance improvements
item.description: A 10 to 15% performance increase and live updates in the dashboard

item.title: v0.9.7 & v0.9.8 - Bugfixes, extra databases and JMX integration
item.description: An overview of the new features in these incremental releases

item.title: v0.9.0 - Dashboard improvements and Redis support!
item.description: Time for a new release and we have some great new treats for you! A lot of time was spend improving the dashboard and we also have Redis support.

item.title: Java batch processing made easy...
item.description: The birth of JobRunr - easy process long-running jobs!
